name: Cushiony Tomb
outcome: [AttackerName] sweetly approaches [TargetName], and her cutesy demeanor lowers [TargetHisOrHer]'s guard just enough that [AttackerName] can grab the foolish adventurer and send them to the ground. |n|When [TargetName] realizes what has happened, their opponent has already wrapped them in her kimono and has positioned her pussy perilously over [TargetHisOrHer] face.
miss: [AttackerName] tries to trick [TargetName] into lowering their guard, but fails to win over the steely adventurer.
